tool_description: (Discord server: https://forms.gle/VVrvWFrRGznehhGPA) TwttrAPI is an unofficial X (Twitter) API with various features for easy access to X data. It supports X Login + 2FA, tweet retrieval, user and search results, content interaction, tweet creation/deletion, and direct message access. It's ideal for scraping public data or building X API-based applications. Reach us at contact@twttrapi.com for custom plans and inquiries.
name: TwttrAPI
title: TwttrAPI

api_list.name: User Lists
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://twttrapi.p.rapidapi.com/user-lists"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "twttrapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
